title: Anne-Marie Slaughter | Princeton Politics
snippet: Upon leaving the State Department she received the Secretary’s Distinguished Service Award for her work leading the Quadrennial Diplomacy and Development Review, as well as meritorious service awards from USAID and the Supreme Allied Commander for Europe. Prior to her government service, Dr. Slaughter was the Dean of Princeton’s Woodrow Wilson School of Public and International Affairs from 2002–2009 and the J.

title: Biography | Anne-Marie Slaughter
snippet: Currently CEO of the think and action tank New America, Anne-Marie Slaughter is a global leader, scholar and public intellectual. She was the J.
